name: Webmentions Server
description: A server to accept IndieWeb webmentions on behalf of your static site

WEBMENTIONS_COOKIE_SECRET.description: A secret unique key for setting cookies

WEBMENTIONS_GITHUB_ID.description: Your GitHub username eg. yourname. Create a personal access token at https://github.com/settings/tokens/new

WEBMENTIONS_HOSTNAME.description: The domain of this app: either your custom domain or default 'herokuapp.com' hostname.

WEBMENTIONS_USER_LIMIT.description: Limit of number of users that can signup
